alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 27 at 3:18PM EDT until March 27 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Miller County in southwestern Georgia... South central Early County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/. * At 318 PM EDT/218 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cottonwood, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Donalsonville, Malone, Jakin, Bascom, Steam Mill, Desser, Crosby, Grangeburg, Davis Park, Little Hope, Lela, Sealy Springs, Riverturn, Hornsville, Donaldsonville A/P, Chattahoochee SP, Lucy, Sills and Sharphagen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
